bioconda.name: gemini
bioconda.summary: a lightweight db framework for disease and population genetics.

biocontainers.name: gemini
biocontainers.summary: A lightweight db framework for disease and population genetics

biotools.summary: GEMINI (GEnome MINIng) is a flexible framework for exploring genetic variation in the context of the wealth of genome annotations available for the human genome. By placing genetic variants, sample phenotypes and genotypes, as well as genome annotations into an integrated database framework, GEMINI provides a simple, flexible, and powerful system for exploring genetic variation for disease and population genetics.
